articles.description: The new flights to Bozeman and Destin-Fort Walton Beach will give Southwest at least 10 new destinations this year.
articles.content:
A big change is coming for any travelers who want to come to the U.S., due to the pandemic.
USA TODAY
Southwest Airlines, continuing to cast about for pandemic passengers, is adding flights to two … [+2210 chars]
